message: The DATA_SOURCE field for indicator 15-4-2, translated into all languages

data.en: NSO SDG focal points will provide reports that include values for both sub-indicators, including the original data and reference sources, and descriptions of how these have been used to derive sub-indicators values. FAO will provide country-specific values for both sub-indicators when national official data do not exist or are incomplete, in consultation with concerned countries
data.es:
